testCase.name: moveTank function should move tank correctly left
moveTank function should move tank right
moveTank function should move tank up
moveTank function should move tank down
rotateTank function should rotate the tank by the given degrees
rotateTank function should rotate tank to 180 degrees
rotateTank function should rotate tank to 270 degrees
rotateTank function should not rotate tank for invalid degrees

displayWinner should remove the winner from the tanks map
